history.proof: intros p n H. induction H using pl_tl_length_ind. - simpl. constructor. - simpl. constructor. apply IHpl_tl_length. - simpl. constructor. apply IHpl_tl_length1. apply IHpl_tl_length2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> pl_tl_length (upl_conv_0 p) n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
upl_conv_0 = fix upl_conv_0 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_0 a) (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
pl_compat_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_compat_check p = Some n -> pl_tl_length p n
pl_compat_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> pl_compat_check p = Some n
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
pl_tl_length_pl_compat : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_compat p0 p1
pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
sem_equiv_prop_l = fun l : term_list => forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p l n = true -> liste_reconnait d p l : term_list -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
invar_list = fun tl : term_list => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tl n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tl m = true : term_list -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1_4_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat), l <> tnil -> rec_list_terms d ls l n = true -> rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) l (S n) = true
beq_nat_complete : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true -> n = m
Neqb_complete : forall n n' : N, (n =? n')%N = true -> n = n'
Nxor_eq_true : forall n n' : N, N.lxor n n' = 0%N -> (n =? n')%N = true
invar_2_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (S n) = true -> rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) n = true \/ rec_term d a hd n = true /\ rec_list_terms d la tl n = true

```coq
intros p n H.
induction H using pl_tl_length_ind.
- simpl. constructor.
- simpl. constructor. apply IHpl_tl_length.
- simpl. constructor. apply IHpl_tl_length1. apply IHpl_tl_length2.
Qed.
```
